title: Shattered World - Crusader Kings II mod
description:
Shattered World - Crusader Kings II mod

Extract 7zip to your 'C:Users [user] Documents Paradox Interactive Crusader Kings II mod' folder

DESCRIPTION
No Dukes or Kings, only Counts! Play as an independent Count on any start date and battle against all others for world dominance! 

For CK2 version 2.1.6

~~~CHANGELOG~~~ 
5.0.1 (2014-JUN-04) Unbroke wars of aggression, doubled cost, made mutually aggressive. Unbroke tool tips. 
5.0.0 (2014-MAY-30) All counts are now generated. Added 2 CBs: a cultural "holy" war and a fast and cheap form of "Fabricate Claim" which you need .5 scaled wealth to use. Updated to 2.1.5. Now compatible with mods which modify the defines.lua. Fixed 2 bugs: generated counts not always being the correct religion and culture; generated count names with ANSI characters getting messed up. 
For more history, see ChangeLog.txt.
